Five Saltpetre deposits are found north-east of the Woodcutting Guild in Hosidius. Saltpetre is obtained by using a spade to dig from these deposits. Only one of the five deposits is active at a time.

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Saltpetre deposit
Level required 1
Mining XP0 xp
Required toolSpade
Respawn time? (edit)

Main drops[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Saltpetre1–2Always5–103–6

The chance for a player to receive 2 saltpetre drop at once is roughly equal to their Mining level out of 100.

Five '''Saltpetre''' deposits are found north-east of the [[Woodcutting Guild]] in [[Hosidius]]. [[Saltpetre]] is obtained by using a [[spade]] to dig from these deposits. Only one of the five deposits is active at a time.

==Mining Info==
{{Mining info
|name = Saltpetre deposit
|level = 1
|xp = 0
|tool = [[Spade]]
|time = 
}}

===Main drops===
{{DropsTableHead}}
{{DropsLineSkill|name=Saltpetre|quantity=1-2|rarity=Always|skill=Mining}}
{{DropsTableBottom}}

The chance for a player to receive 2 [[saltpetre]] drop at once is roughly equal to their Mining level out of 100.
